body_html:
Ok - well this worked but I thought it didn't - so maybe to avoid others being as slow-witted as I am:
I uninstalled, removed the repo, cloned, bazel build, pip install, got the same error.
The problem is I went root to bazel build and install. If I invoke python from root tensorflow imports. If I invoke python as a user - TF import fails.

body:
Ok - well this worked but I thought it didn't - so maybe to avoid others being as slow-witted as I am:
 I uninstalled, removed the repo, cloned, bazel build, pip install, got the same error.  
The problem is I went root to bazel build and install.  If I invoke python from root tensorflow imports.  If I invoke python as a user - TF import fails.
